bibl.title: De 'nieuwe Poseidippos': een dichtbundel uit de Oudheid? [Le "nouveau Posidippe": un recueil poétique antique?] Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Have the epigrams been arranged by the poet himself? The author argues that this is in fact the case. Poseidippos has arranged his epigrams in nine sections: poems about stones, bird-signs, dedications, graves of deceased, sculptors, victories in horse-racing, etc.
bibl.seg: BREMER Jan Maarten, De 'nieuwe Poseidippos': een dichtbundel uit de Oudheid? [Le "nouveau Posidippe": un recueil poétique antique?] Avec résumé en anglais.

Have the epigrams been arranged by the poet himself? The author argues that this is in fact the case. Poseidippos has arranged his epigrams in nine sections: poems about stones, bird-signs, dedications, graves of deceased, sculptors, victories in horse-racing, etc.
